import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (

About Credence

Credence is a crypto staking app that allows users to earn rewards by staking their cryptocurrency. Our platform uses a secure and reliable system to ensure that your funds are always safe and accessible.

To participate, please make sure to follow these steps:

  1. Connect your MetaMask wallet to our platform.
  2. We currently support live test networks such as Rinkeby, Stardust, Mumbai, and Meter.
  3. Claim 50 mUSDT tokens for staking.
  4. Stake your mUSDT tokens and wait for 1 minute.
  5. While waiting, enjoy some particle interactions on our platform.
  6. Once the timer ends, you will receive an airdrop of RWD tokens.
  7. You can unstake your mUSDT tokens anytime you want.

Our team is dedicated to providing a seamless and user-friendly experience for our customers. If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at support@credence.com.

); }; export default About;
